title: How to install Grammarly as administrator
content:
Even users with administrator permissions must explicitly invoke those permissions to run programs that require elevated privileges. This is part of the Windows security system.
To run the installer as an administrator, do the following:
Download
the latest add-in version to your preferred folder.
Right-click on GrammarlyAddInSetup.exe and select
Run as administrator
Click
Yes
and follow the instructions on your screen to install Grammarly for Microsoft Office:
